snippet: Southeastern Asset Management is seeking a list of shareholders and other books and records from Dell, according to a letter to the computer maker’s board sent on Tuesday.
abstract: Southeastern Asset Management is seeking a list of shareholders and other books and records from Dell, according to a letter to the computer maker’s board sent on Tuesday.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Still-Unhappy Southeastern Seeks Dell Shareholder List
